ab_id.label: Antibody
ab_id.description: the COVID ID for the antibody

ab_label.label: Antibody label
ab_label.description: the COVIC label for the antibody

ab_name.label: Antibody name
ab_name.description: the submitter's name for the antibody

ab_details.label: Antibody details
ab_details.comment: confidential, unstructured assay details on antibody from the sumbitter

ab_comment.label: Antibody comment
ab_comment.comment: confidential free text about the antibody

org_name.label: Organization name
org_name.description: the name of the organization that submitted the antibody
org_name.comment: the organization that is submitted the antibody

submitter_email.label: Submitter email
submitter_email.description: the email of the person who submitted this data

host_type_id.label: Host
host_type_id.description: the ID of the host species

host_type_label.label: Host name
host_type_label.description: the label of the host species

isotype_id.label: Isotype
isotype_id.description: the ID of the antibody isotype

isotype_label.label: Isotype label
isotype_label.description: the label of the antibody isotype

qualitative_measure.label: Qualitiative measure
qualitative_measure.description: the qualitative measure of the assay

titer.label: Titer
titer.description: the titer value of the assay

tested_antigen.label: Tested antigen
tested_antigen.description: the name of the tested antigen

n.label: n
n.description: the number of runs for the assay

day_of_death.label: Day of death
day_of_death.description: the day on which the subject died

death_reason.label: Death reason
death_reason.description: the reason that the subject died

weight_day_0.label: Weight day 0
weight_day_0.description: the weight of the subject in grams on day 0

weight_day_1.label: Weight day 1
weight_day_1.description: the weight of the subject in grams on day 1

weight_day_2.label: Weight day 2
weight_day_2.description: the weight of the subject in grams on day 2

weight_day_3.label: Weight day 3
weight_day_3.description: the weight of the subject in grams on day 3

weight_day_4.label: Weight day 4
weight_day_4.description: the weight of the subject in grams on day 4

weight_day_5.label: Weight day 5
weight_day_5.description: the weight of the subject in grams on day 5

weight_day_6.label: Weight day 6
weight_day_6.description: the weight of the subject in grams on day 6

weight_day_7.label: Weight day 7
weight_day_7.description: the weight of the subject in grams on day 7

weight_day_8.label: Weight day 8
weight_day_8.description: the weight of the subject in grams on day 8

weight_day_9.label: Weight day 9
weight_day_9.description: the weight of the subject in grams on day 9

weight_day_10.label: Weight day 10
weight_day_10.description: the weight of the subject in grams on day 10

titer_nasal_day_2.label: Viral titer nasal turbinates day 2
titer_nasal_day_2.description: viral titer nasal turbinates day 2 in PFU/ml

titer_nasal_day_4.label: Viral titer nasal turbinates day 4
titer_nasal_day_4.description: viral titer nasal turbinates day 4 in PFU/ml

titer_lung_day_2.label: Viral titer lung day 2
titer_lung_day_2.description: viral titer lung day 2 in PFU/ml

titer_lung_day_4.label: Viral titer lung day 4
titer_lung_day_4.description: viral titer lung day 4 in PFU/ml

mutation.label: Mutation
mutation.description:
a comma-separated list of mutations in one of these formats:
    1. point mutation: old amino acid, sequence position, new amino acid
    2. point deletion: "del", sequence position
    3. range deletion: "del", start position, "-", end position

ref1_ic50.label: ref1 IC50 (ng/ml)
ref1_ic50.description: a neutralization assay measuring the IC50 of the ref1 antibody in ng/mL

ref2_ic50.label: ref2 IC50 (ng/ml)
ref2_ic50.description: a neutralization assay measuring the IC50 of the ref2 antibody in ng/mL

score_ade_10.label: Score (for level of ADE at 10 ug/mL)
score_ade_10.description: a score classifying the ADE at 10 ug/mL: "Low to No" (ADE <1000%); "Moderate" (ADE 1000-10000%); "High" (ADE >10000%)

on rate; Ka in M^-1s^-1.label: on rate; Ka in M^-1s^-1
on rate; Ka in M^-1s^-1.description: an SPR assay measuring on rate [Ka] in M^-1s^-1

off rate; Kd in 1/s.label: off rate; Kd in 1/s
off rate; Kd in 1/s.description: an SPR assay measuring off rate [Kd] in 1/s

dissociation constant; KD in nM.label: dissociation constant; KD in nM
dissociation constant; KD in nM.description: an SPR assay measuring dissociation constant [KD] in nM

dissociation constant; KD in M.label: dissociation constant; KD in M
dissociation constant; KD in M.description: an SPR assay measuring dissociation constant [KD] in M

ACE 2 response; in nM.label: ACE 2 response; in nM
ACE 2 response; in nM.description: a neutralization assay measuring ACE 2 response in nM

ACE 2 response; percent blocking.label: ACE 2 response; percent blocking
ACE 2 response; percent blocking.description: a neutralization assay measuring ACE 2 response in percent blocking

mAb concentration (ug/mL).label: mAb concentration (ug/mL)
mAb concentration (ug/mL).description: the amount of antibody dissolved in the solution being tested, reported in ug/mL

neutralization IC50 (ug/mL).label: neutralization IC50 (ug/mL)
neutralization IC50 (ug/mL).description: a neutralization assay measuring the IC50 of the tested antibody in ug/mL

neutralization IC80 (ug/mL).label: neutralization IC80 (ug/mL)
neutralization IC80 (ug/mL).description: a neutralization assay measuring the IC80 of the tested antibody in ug/mL

neutralization IC90 (ug/mL).label: neutralization IC90 (ug/mL)
neutralization IC90 (ug/mL).description: a neutralization assay measuring the IC90 of the tested antibody in ug/mL

ADCP (Phagocytic Score).label: ADCP (Phagocytic Score)
ADCP (Phagocytic Score).description: assay that measures antibody initiated phagocytosis by binding its Fc domain to a specific receptor on a phagocytic cell using a phagocytic score

ADNP (Phagocytic Score).label: ADNP (Phagocytic Score)
ADNP (Phagocytic Score).description: assay that measures antibody initiated phagocytosis of neutrophils by binding its Fc domain to a specific receptor on neutrophils using a phagocytic score

ADCD (MFI C3).label: ADCD (MFI C3)
ADCD (MFI C3).description: assay to measure complement component C3b on the surface of target cells using MFI

ADNKA % CD107a+.label: ADNKA % CD107a+
ADNKA % CD107a+.description: assay measuring the percent of NK cells expressing CD107a as a result of antibody binding

ADNKA % MIP-1b+.label: ADNKA % MIP-1b+
ADNKA % MIP-1b+.description: assay measuring the percent of NK cells expressing MIP-1b using a phagocytic score

mADCP (Phagocytic Score).label: mADCP (Phagocytic Score)
mADCP (Phagocytic Score).description: assay that measures antibody initiated phagocytosis by binding its Fc domain to a specific receptor on a mouse cell using a phagocytic score

mADNP (Phagocytic Score).label: mADNP (Phagocytic Score)
mADNP (Phagocytic Score).description: assay that measures antibody initiated phagocytosis of neutrophils by binding its Fc domain to a specific receptor on a mouse cell using a phagocytic score

FcgR2aR (MFI).label: FcgR2aR (MFI)
FcgR2aR (MFI).description: assay measuring antibody affinity for FcgR2aR receptor on human cells using median fluorescence intensity

FcgR3aV (MFI).label: FcgR3aV (MFI)
FcgR3aV (MFI).description: assay measuring antibody affinity for FcgR3aV receptor on human cells using median fluorescence intensity

FcgR2b (MFI).label: FcgR2b (MFI)
FcgR2b (MFI).description: assay measuring antibody affinity for FcgR2b receptor on human cells using median fluorescence intensity

FcgR3b (MFI).label: FcgR3b (MFI)
FcgR3b (MFI).description: assay measuring antibody affinity for FcgR3b receptor on human cells using median fluorescence intensity

FcRn (MFI).label: FcRn (MFI)
FcRn (MFI).description: assay measuring antibody affinity for FcRn receptor on human cells using median fluorescence intensity

mFcR2 (MFI).label: mFcR2 (MFI)
mFcR2 (MFI).description: assay measuring antibody affinity for FcR2 receptor on mouse cells using median fluorescence intensity

mFcR3 (MFI).label: mFcR3 (MFI)
mFcR3 (MFI).description: assay measuring antibody affinity for mFcR3 receptor on mouse cells using median fluorescence intensity

mFcR4 (MFI).label: mFcR4 (MFI)
mFcR4 (MFI).description: assay measuring antibody affinity for mFcR receptor on mouse cells using median fluorescence intensity

antibody cross-blocking assay.label: antibody cross-blocking assay
antibody cross-blocking assay.description: A competitive inhibition of binding assay in which two antibodies that are known to bind the same antigen are tested for the ability of one antibody to inhibit binding of the other antibody to the antigen, thereby determining if they have overlapping binding sites.

Inflammation.label: Inflammation
Inflammation.description: in vivo protection assay based on inflammation score of 0-5

Edema.label: Edema
Edema.description: in vivo protection assay based on edema score of 0-5

Vasculitis.label: Vasculitis
Vasculitis.description: in vivo protection assay based on vasculitis score of 0-5

Necrosis.label: Necrosis
Necrosis.description: in vivo protection assay based on necrosis score of 0-5

Hemorrhage.label: Hemorrhage
Hemorrhage.description: in vivo protection assay based on hemorrhage score of 0-5

weight.label: weight
weight.description: in vivo protection assay based on weight of organism in grams

viral titer nasal turbinates.label: viral titer nasal turbinates
viral titer nasal turbinates.description: in vivo protection assay based on viral titer in nasal turbinates measured in PFU/ml

viral titer lung.label: viral titer lung
viral titer lung.description: in vivo protection assay based on viral titer in lung tissue measured in PFU/ml

neutralization IC50 (ng/mL).label: neutralization IC50 (ng/mL)
neutralization IC50 (ng/mL).description: a neutralization assay measuring the IC50 of the tested antibody in ng/mL

neutralization IC80 (ng/mL).label: neutralization IC80 (ng/mL)
neutralization IC80 (ng/mL).description: a neutralization assay measuring the IC80 of the tested antibody in ng/mL

neutralization IC90 (ng/mL).label: neutralization IC90 (ng/mL)
neutralization IC90 (ng/mL).description: a neutralization assay measuring the IC90 of the tested antibody in ng/mL

ADE 10 ug/mL (% to virus control).label: ADE 10 ug/mL (% to virus control)
ADE 10 ug/mL (% to virus control).description: antibody-dependent enhancement assay measuring percent enhancement compared to virus alone, performed using 10ug/ml of antibody

ADE 1 ug/mL (% to virus control).label: ADE 1 ug/mL (% to virus control)
ADE 1 ug/mL (% to virus control).description: antibody-dependent enhancement assay measuring percent enhancement compared to virus alone, performed using 1ug/ml of antibody

ADE 0.1 ug/mL (% to virus control).label: ADE 0.1 ug/mL (% to virus control)
ADE 0.1 ug/mL (% to virus control).description: antibody-dependent enhancement assay measuring percent enhancement compared to virus alone, performed using 0.1ug/ml of antibody

Starting dilution fold.label: Starting dilution fold
Starting dilution fold.description: the fold change from the starting concentration of a solution being diluted

Starting concentration (ug/mL).label: Starting concentration (ug/mL)
Starting concentration (ug/mL).description: the initial amount of antibody dissolved in the solution being diluted, reported in ug/mL

4-PL curve parameter A.label: 4-PL curve parameter A
4-PL curve parameter A.description: the minimum value that can be obtained

4-PL curve parameter D.label: 4-PL curve parameter D
4-PL curve parameter D.description: the maximum value that can be obtained

4-PL curve R2.label: 4-PL curve R2
4-PL curve R2.description: a statistical measure of fit that indicates how much variation of a dependent variable is explained by the independent variable(s)

ULOD (ng/mL).label: ULOD (ng/mL)
ULOD (ng/mL).description: the upper limit of detection in ng/ml

LLOD (ng/mL).label: LLOD (ng/mL)
LLOD (ng/mL).description: the lower limit of detection in ng/ml
